comments.body: [~ccassler], could you create sub-tasks for each upgrade scenario that QA are planning to test? This is to create unified view for the upgrade project from development to QA and documentations?
[~vasya]: I have entered some upgrade scenarios.  If more scenarios are found that will be useful, I will add them.
Closed this too soon.   Waiting for 1 ticket.
All tests are completed.  Closing this story.
